text: ara amara yadi era age tadera dhbansa karatama sasti diye tabe tara balate parata -- ''amadera prabhu! Tumi kena amadera kache ekajana rasula patha'o ni, tahale to amara tomara nirdesabali anusarana karate paratama amadera lanchana bhoga karabara o amadera apamana anubhabera agebhage'i?â€™â€™
